MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Orchard Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out investigation work and found an underground cable fault at the junction of Ladywell Road and Orchard Street and we now expect your supply to be restored by 6am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.55AM on 6th January 2021.
